overview:
Jack Sivilli joined Webcollage in September of 2007 and brings over 20 years financial and management experience to his role as Chief Financial Officer. Prior to joining Webcollage, Jack was the Chief Financial Officer of OfficeTiger a leading international business process outsourcing (BPO) firm that was acquired by RR Donnelley (NYSE:RRD) in April of 2006. He previously worked at Monster.com as a divisional Finance Director with responsibility for one of two North American Shared Service Centers. Jack is a Certified Public Accountant who started his career with KPMG, where he became a Senior Audit Manager in the New York Office serving such clients as PepsiCo, Inc., Synergy Gas, Aceto Corporation, and wide range of other middle market clients.

Source : Webcollage.com
